nodes.text: Anya was a Serennian female, the lady of House Serenno, and the wife of Count Gora during the reign of the Galactic Republic. As consort to the Count of Serenno, Anya held the title of Countess. She was the mother of Jenza and Ramil, as well as the Force-sensitive Dooku who joined the Jedi Order. She would eventually die and be buried at the Serenno family mausoleum on the moon Mantero.
